card1.title: Childcare Service
card1.text: We provide evening childcare for children ages 0-6 from 5:00PM to 9:30PM, including dinner, bath, play, and bedtime routines. This service allows parents to enjoy some personal time. Cost: ¥8,000 (includes dinner, ¥7,500 for allergies), capacity: 3 children.

card2.title: My Body My Choice Project
card2.text: Providing comprehensive sex education with the motto 'My body is my own.' We offer education for children, youth, and parents, empowering individuals to make informed choices about their bodies and lives. Pricing varies based on content and budget.

card3.title: Talk with a Midwife
card3.text: Online consultation service a professional registered midwife. We address pregnancy and childcare concerns, support for international residents (English available), pregnancy loss, fertility treatment, physical health issues, family planning, and more. Options: Quick consultation (30min/¥3,000), In-depth consultation (60min/¥5,500), Email consultation (¥2,500).

card4.title: Journal 'In My Case'
card4.text: A journal documenting diverse experiences related to sexuality and reproduction. Rather than showcasing success stories, we provide thoughtful records of everyday lives, allowing readers to engage deeply with others' experiences.

card5.title: English Support Available
card5.text: We offer pregnancy and childcare consultation services in English for foreign residents in Japan. We also support Japanese residents living abroad with their concerns.

2017.title: Registered Nurse License Obtained
2017.description: Worked at a general hospital and emergency medical center in Tokyo. Gained experience at the forefront of acute care medicine, facing many lives daily.

2019.title: Transferred to Chronic Care Unit After Childbirth
2019.description: Practiced nursing with careful attention to patients with neurological diseases. Experienced diverse fields including home care, end-of-life care, and family support.

2022.title: Certified Midwife License Obtained
2022.description: Worked at a comprehensive perinatal care center. Provided medical care for pregnant women from low-risk to high-risk cases. Realized the importance of continuous community support.

2024.title: Adolescent Health Counselor Certification
2024.description: Started activities as a sex education instructor alongside main work. Practiced in various settings.

2025.title: Transition to Local Obstetrics and Gynecology Clinic
2025.description: Chose a work style without night shifts to match lifestyle. While continuing community-based care, officially launched individual practice 'March Waters'. Currently exploring new forms of support as a midwife, sex education instructor, and SRHR provider.

project.title: About Our Childcare Service
project.description: We provide evening childcare for children aged 0 to preschool from 5:00PM to 9:30PM. In Japan, it can be difficult for parents to find time for themselves, to have uninterrupted conversations with partners or friends, or simply to relax without careful planning. While children are important, adults also deserve time for self-care. Let us help you incorporate self-care into your daily routine.

project.title: About My Body My Choice Project
project.description: "My body is my own." We want to create a society where this fundamental principle is understood by everyone. With knowledge, people can make choices that align with their authentic selves. Knowledge is an ally that can protect you and those around you in critical moments. With this mission in mind, we provide education about bodies and sexuality based on internationally standardized comprehensive sex education curriculum.

project.title: Talk with a Midwife
project.description: "Is it okay to ask my doctor about this? Should I go to the hospital for this concern?" Working in hospitals, I've heard these questions many times. Whether you're concerned about your body or sexuality, carrying uncertainties, or simply need someone to talk to—regardless of your age, nationality, or pregnancy status—please feel free to reach out. English service is available.

purpose.title: Purpose
purpose.content: These terms of service define the basic conditions for using all services provided by March Waters, including midwife consultations, childcare services, and educational programs.

membership.title: Service Eligibility
membership.content: Our services are available to all individuals seeking support. There are no specific restrictions for accessing our services, though we recommend consulting with your healthcare provider before participating in any health-related consultations.

member_responsibilities.title: Client Responsibilities
member_responsibilities.content: Clients are responsible for providing accurate information during bookings and consultations. You agree to arrive on time for scheduled appointments and to inform us of any changes to your circumstances that may affect the service provided.

prohibited_actions.title: Prohibited Actions
prohibited_actions.content: The following actions are prohibited when using our services: 1) Engaging in illegal activities. 2) Harassment of staff or other clients. 3) Providing false information. 4) Disrupting services for other clients. 5) Any behavior that compromises the safety and comfort of others.

facility_usage.title: Service Usage and Appointments
facility_usage.content: Appointments can be booked through our online system. Cancellations and refunds are allowed according to our cancellation policy. Clients are responsible for their own belongings during service provision. We are not liable for lost or stolen items.

membership_suspension.title: Service Suspension
membership_suspension.content: March Waters reserves the right to refuse or suspend services to clients who violate these terms or engage in inappropriate behavior.

online_reservation.title: Online Booking System
online_reservation.content: Our online booking system allows you to schedule, modify, and confirm appointments. We may update or temporarily suspend the booking system without notice. Appointments are confirmed when you receive a confirmation email.

privacy.title: Privacy Protection
privacy.content: March Waters protects client personal information in accordance with our Privacy Policy. We do not share personal information with third parties except as necessary for service provision.

fees.title: Fees and Payment
fees.content: Service fees are paid per appointment. We reserve the right to update our pricing with advance notice. Payment is accepted via credit card or cash.

service_changes.title: Service Modifications
service_changes.content: March Waters may modify or discontinue services due to circumstances beyond our control. In such cases, we will provide appropriate notice and refunds where applicable.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: March Waters provides services to the best of our ability but is not liable for outcomes beyond our direct control. Clients use our services at their own discretion and responsibility.

terms_revision.title: Terms Revision
terms_revision.content: March Waters may revise these terms of service without prior notice. Updated terms will be posted on our website and apply to all future service bookings.

effective_date.title: Effective Date
effective_date.content: These terms of service are effective from January 1, 2025.
